summary: In the depths of the Depression, two teenage boys strike out on their own in order to help their struggling parents and find life on the road tougher than expected.
cast: Frankie Darro|Edwin Phillips|Rochelle Hudson|Dorothy Coonan Wellman|Sterling Holloway|Arthur Hohl|Ann Hovey|Minna Gombell|Grant Mitchell|Claire McDowell|Robert Barrat|Willard Robertson|Beaudine Anderson|William Augustin|Ward Bond|Wade Boteler|James Cagney|Eddy Chandler|John R. keywords: riding the rails|prothesis|manhattan new york city|juvenile court|hooverville
title: Wild Boys of the Road
